image.description: An astronaut in a spacesuit doing a downward dog pose underwater, with fish swimming around
A diagram of the human body in zero gravity, with arrows pointing to muscle groups affected by weightlessness
A futuristic underwater habitat with a large glass dome, inside which astronauts are practicing yoga
A close-up of an astronaut's face inside a helmet, looking surprised and confused, with the text 'Why am I doing this?' overlaid
A group of penguins doing synchronized swimming formations
A cartoon of the solar system, with each planet represented by a different yoga pose
A split-screen image: on one side, an astronaut floating in space; on the other, a person floating in a sensory deprivation tank
A pie chart with nonsensical segments labeled 'Cosmic Flexibility', 'Aquatic Zen', and 'Space Noodle Arms'
A random image of a llama wearing sunglasses, with the text 'In Conclusion' overlaid
